context.rdfs:comment: A permission for a particular person or group to access a particular file.
context.rdfs:label: DigitalDocumentPermission

properties.rdfs:comment: The person, organization, contact point, or audience that has been granted this permission.
properties.rdfs:label: grantee

properties.rdfs:comment: The type of permission granted the person, organization, or audience.
properties.rdfs:label: permissionType
